testimonials.name: Kelvin Chng
testimonials.title: CTO & Co-Founder of Carro
testimonials.subtitle: efficiency increase
testimonials.text: Lark has been a wonderful addition to our toolbox. The solutions offered, especially in the powerful custom integrations, make Lark a powerful tool for companies looking for a workplace superapp.

testimonials.name: Yang Xibei
testimonials.title: Director of Branding and Marketing at Haidilao
testimonials.subtitle: hours saved (and counting)
testimonials.text: Lark has significantly boosted our efficiency without juggling paperwork and multiple tools. Lark not only empowers us to provide the service we have been proud of, but also helps us pave the way for all restaurant managers to solve their growth challenges through digitization.

testimonials.name: Mengjie Liu
testimonials.title: Head of Human Resources, SSC at Advance Intelligence
testimonials.subtitle: global employees use Lark
testimonials.text: If you're operating on a multinational scale and aiming to enhance global collaboration, Lark is the ideal solution. Its 'all-in-one' framework simplifies enterprise-level operations, earning high praise from our team members.
